robDex.util

Class Compiler

  • Object
    • Compiler

  • public class Compiler
extends Object
    This class is used to compile java files into a DEX file.
    Author:
    Nicolas Fedy

    • Method Detail

      • startCommandProcess

        private static void startCommandProcess(String directory,
                                        String errorFileName,
                                        List<String> command)
                                 throws FailedCompilationException
        Starts a process and waits for its death.
        Parameters:
        directory - directory in which the process must be launched.
        errorFileName - name of the file to redirect errors. If null errors will be ignored.
        command - the command with its arguments to be launched.
        Throws:
        FailedCompilationException - if the process' exit status is different from 0.

      • startCommandProcess

        private static void startCommandProcess(String dir,
                                        String errorFile,
                                        List<String> files,
                                        String command,
                                        String... options)
                                 throws FailedCompilationException
        Start a process with files as arguments and waits for its death.
        Parameters:
        dir - directory in which the process must be launched.
        errorFile - name of the file to redirect errors. If null errors will be ignored.
        files - files' names to be added as arguments.
        command - command to be launched.
        options - command's additional arguments.
        Throws:
        FailedCompilationException - if the process' exit status is different from 0.

      • startCommandProcess

        private static void startCommandProcess(String dir,
                                        List<String> files,
                                        String command,
                                        String... options)
                                 throws FailedCompilationException
        Start a process with files as arguments and waits for its death. Errors will be ignored.
        Parameters:
        dir - directory in which the process must be launched.
        files - files' names to be added as arguments.
        command - command to be launched.
        options - command's additional arguments.
        Throws:
        FailedCompilationException - if the process' exit status is different from 0.

      • compileIntoClass

        private static void compileIntoClass(String idir,
                                     String odir,
                                     List<String> fileNames)
                              throws FailedCompilationException
        Compile a list of java files into class files.
        Parameters:
        idir - java files' location.
        odir - directory in which the class files will be located.
        fileNames - java files' names.
        Throws:
        FailedCompilationException - if the process' exit status is different from 0.

      • convertLambda

        private static void convertLambda(String idir,
                                  String odir,
                                  List<String> fileNames)
                           throws FailedCompilationException
        Convert java 8 class files to java 7 class files.
        Parameters:
        idir - java 8 class files' location.
        odir - directory in which the java 7 class files will be located.
        fileNames - class files' names.
        Throws:
        FailedCompilationException - if the process' exit status is different from 0.

      • extractJar

        public static void extractJar()
                       throws FailedCompilationException
        Extracts the content of a jar file.
        Throws:
        FailedCompilationException - if the process' exit status is different from 0.

      • compileIntoDex

        private static void compileIntoDex(String idir,
                                   String odir,
                                   List<String> fileNames)
                            throws FailedCompilationException
        Compiles a list of class files into a DEX file. If class files are compiled using java 8, the result is undefined.
        Parameters:
        idir - class files' location.
        odir - directory in which the DEX file will be located.
        fileNames - class files' names.
        Throws:
        FailedCompilationException - if the process' exit status is different from 0.

      • compile

        public static void compile(String dir,
                           List<File> files)
                    throws FailedCompilationException
        Compiles a list of java files into a DEX file.
        Parameters:
        dir - java files' location.
        files - java files' names.
        Throws:
        FailedCompilationException - if the process' exit status is different from 0.
